message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it offers significant value, even above its market price. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $22,000 is already a competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?

Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I would like to stick to my original budget. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
